txt.en:
'Ah! Look at this, [placeholder]! It is stunning.

'It is not as safe as I would like, but it does not seem so bad, either. Truth be told, I am glad for this opportunity to explore....

'Let us head south-east a little ways.'
'I thought I spotted the light of a camp-fire down low, [placeholder]! I do not know how to get to it, but let us try. Perhaps it is a friend to the Iron Garrison.'
Fixing a Squeaky Wheel

'Friendly faces! That was not something I expected to see here. I was just passing through, but I needed to find a safe place to rest, for I have encountered many foes in my passage through these halls....\n\n'Dómárr, at your service!'

'Harrumph. I can see when I'm not wanted. Well, perhaps I will find another outpost in Moria with wiser leadership than here.

'I will meet you south of here, [placeholder]. To be honest, I look forward to exploring. I saw on a map that we might encounter the Hall of Durin!

'Here is a signal you may use if you wish to call me to your side.'
Called Reinn to your side

'This looks like a safe place to rest! Reinn at your service, and this is my stalwart companion [placeholder].\n\n'I am glad to see a friendly face here as well, for I just came from the Twenty-first Hall, and expected a long and lonely journey.'
You have come upon the Great Hall of Durin
Reinn wishes to explore to the south-east
Reinn is in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should speak with Reinn.
Reinn wishes to speak with you
The summoning horn can be found in the Twenty-first Hall, next to Mögr.\n\nYou should use the horn to call Reinn to your side when you are ready to depart.
Reinn has spotted a camp-fire on the lower level of the Great Hall of Durin
The Great Hall of Durin is south of the Twenty-first Hall, found by taking a right from the southern arch.\n\nMögr has asked you to explore the hall south of the Twenty-first Hall.
Reinn can be called to your side using the horn he gave you.\n\nYou should speak with Reinn.
The Great Hall of Durin is south of the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should explore the Great Hall of Durin in Zelem-melek with Reinn, heading south-east.
Reinn can be called to your side using the horn he gave you.\n\nYou should speak with Reinn.
You spotted the light of a camp-fire on the lower levels of the Great Hall of Durin.\n\nYou should find the camp-fire and the one who tends it.
Reinn can be called to your side using the horn he gave you.\n\nYou should speak with Reinn.
Speak with Reinn about his departure
Use the summoning horn to call Reinn when you are ready
Explore the hall south of the Twenty-first Hall
Talk to Reinn (use the horn to summon him)
Explore south-east in the Great Hall of Durin
Speak with Reinn (use the horn to summon him)
Find the owner of the camp-fire's light
Speak with Reinn (use the horn to summon him)
Mögr has grown tired of Reinn's constant moaning about the work to be done in the Twenty-first Hall, and invites the dwarf to continue with the expedition in the Twenty-first Hall.

'Reinn is a squeaky wheel, and is ruining the morale of my dwarves... and of me as well! I think it will be good for him to carry on the exploration of Zelem-melek.\n\n'Perhaps then he will see once and for all that there is no danger here worth fussing over. I hear there is a grand hall to the south of here that awaits exploration. You should join him, [placeholder]!'
